list_id.about: The numerical id of the list.

slug.about: You can identify a list by its slug instead of its numerical id. If you decide to do so, note that youâ€™ll also have to specify the list owner using the owner_id or owner_screen_name parameters.

user_id.about: The ID of the user for whom to return results for.

screen_name.about: The screen name of the user for whom to return results for.

owner_screen_name.about: The screen name of the user who owns the list being requested by a slug.

owner_id.about: The user ID of the user who owns the list being requested by a slug.

include_user_entities.about: The user object entities node will not be included when set to false.

skip_status.about: When set to either true , t or 1 , statuses will not be included in the returned user objects. If set to any other value, statuses will be included.
